DOC.brief_summary: The aim of this study is to determine whether medical clown activity enables relaxation of mothers of premature infants, and as a result increases their breast milk production.
DOC.brief_title: Influence of Medical Clown Activity on Milk Production of Mothers of Premature Infants
DOC.criteria: Nursing mothers of infants born less than 34th week Sick mothers Take medication forbidden during nursing
